item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Since I received such positive feedback about the Gaslight, and so many people wished that they could have joined us there, how about a final return visit on Saturday, January 23rd? The Gaslight is a great place and there's plenty of free parking.

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin
560 Harrison Ave
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 422-0224
Price: Reasonable
www.gaslight560.com (check them out on the web)

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin, (literally brasserie on the corner) is the Aquitaine Groupâ€™s classic neighborhood Parisian brasserie.

The Gaslight usually turns out to be a memorable time so I hope to see you there!

Cheers,
Michael

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Return to the Gaslight: For a Final Farewell to Brunch And More ...
